TEXT.TITLE: SUPERMARKETS <SGL> REDEEMS PURCHASE RIGHTS
TEXT.BODY: Supermarkets General Corp said it redeemed its preferred stock purchase rights on May 29 and will pay five cts a right in the near future to holders of record May 29. Reuter
